overview.en: Cupidchain is the first practical blockchain program in the dating industry around the world. Through the creative business model of “recommending equals mining”, CPT integrates its dating service with the technology of blockchain, and applies the operation mode of “everyone is a matchmaker”. In this way, it is building a decentralized and reliable dating ecology platform which is shared and administrated by all and can benefit all.
overview.zh: Cupidchain 是全球婚恋行业第一个落地的区块链项目，通过业内首创的“推荐即挖矿”的商业模式，将自身业务与区块链技术完美融合，实现“人人即红娘”的运营方式，从而构建起一个去中心化、安全可信的共享、共治、共赢的婚恋交友生态平台。
